As one of the most renowned injury law firms throughout the nation, we have helped countless maritime workers and their families go up against the largest offshore companies and win. We are proud to help clients in Houston, throughout all of Texas, and nationwide, including clients in Louisiana, Alabama, and Mississippi.

If you or a loved one has been injured, we encourage you to reach out to us now. We can help you take the necessary steps to fight for what you deserve.

In 2013, the CDC released a study looking into fatal offshore injuries. They noted that someone working in the offshore oil and gas industry is 7 times more likely to die than other workers. As officially the most dangerous industry in the country, it is no surprise that maritime workers find themselves suffering from devastating, even life-altering injuries.

As an injured maritime worker, you have special rights and ways to seek compensation, and you need the help of the best attorneys to win.
